summary.title: E-Commerce Threat Model
summary.description: This threat model focuses on the security of an e-commerce platform, covering user registration, product search, and payment processing.

diagrams.title: User Registration and Authentication
diagrams.description: This diagram shows how users register, log in, and authenticate in the e-commerce platform.

diagrams.title: Payment Processing
diagrams.description: This diagram shows how the e-commerce platform handles payment processing, including data transfer, payment gateway interactions, and transaction validation.
